alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 10:24AM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
